welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Tomball, where southern hospitality meets small-town charm! Known for its historic downtown, delicious BBQ, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and soak up all that our vibrant city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery Co Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used by United Airlines for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C is used by multiple airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Terminal D is the international terminal at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, serving multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Terminal E is primarily used by United Airlines for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Houston Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at West Houston Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
